snippet: A Russian news crew appears to have brought that nation’s fondness for dashboard-mounted cameras to reporting on the war in Syria.
abstract: A Russian news crew appears to have brought that nation’s fondness for dashboard-mounted cameras to reporting on the war in Syria.

headline.main: Russians Bring Dashcam War Reporting to Syria
